response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. We believe in creating lasting relationships built on trust and mutual benefit. Considering the exceptional quality and functionality of this product, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
